Customer.title: Customer
Customer.description: Represents a customer in the TaxEase system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the customer entity.

signupDate.description: Date when the customer signed up.

TaxDocument.title: TaxDocument
TaxDocument.description: Represents a tax document uploaded by a customer or admin.

id.description: Unique identifier for the tax document.

uploadDate.description: Date when the tax document was uploaded.

fileUrl.description: URL of the uploaded tax document in Firebase Storage.

documentType.description: Type of the tax document (e.g., W-2, 1099, Tax Estimation, Final Return).

taxYear.description: The tax year that this document applies to

category.description: Category of the document, indicating its role in the workflow.

Appointment.title: Appointment
Appointment.description: Represents a scheduled appointment between a customer and a tax professional.

customerId.description: Reference to Customer, if the user is logged in. (Relationship: Customer 1:N Appointment)

appointmentDate.description: Date and time of the appointment.

status.description: Status of the appointment (e.g., Scheduled, Confirmed, Completed, Cancelled).

notes.description: Any notes or comments related to the appointment.

Referral.title: Referral
Referral.description: Represents a referral made by a customer.

referrerId.description: Reference to Customer who made the referral, if logged in. (Relationship: Customer 1:N Referral)

referredEmail.description: Email address of the person who was referred.

referralDate.description: Date when the referral was made.

status.description: Status of the referral (e.g., Pending, Accepted, Declined).

referredCustomerId.description: Reference to Customer who was referred, if they signed up. (Relationship: Referral 1:1 Customer)

SiteSettings.title: SiteSettings
SiteSettings.description: Represents global settings for the site, such as downloadable forms.

currentYearFormUrl.description: URL for the current year's global tax form.

priorYearFormUrl.description: URL for the prior year's global tax form.

definition.description: Stores customer profiles. Each document represents a single customer, including anonymous users.
Stores tax documents uploaded by customers. The customerId in the path ensures ownership.

params.name: customerId
params.description: Unique identifier for the customer who owns the document.

params.name: taxDocumentId
params.description: Unique identifier for the tax document.

definition.description: Top-level collection for all appointment requests, from both guests and registered users.
Top-level collection for all referrals, from both guests and registered users.
A single document to hold URLs for global downloadable forms.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure has been updated to use top-level collections for appointments and referrals. This simplifies data access for administrative purposes and allows for more flexible security rules, such as permitting unauthenticated users to create appointments or referrals. Customer-specific data like tax documents remains in a subcollection for clear ownership and security. A new `siteSettings` collection has been added to store global configuration like downloadable form URLs.
